title: Number of expressways gas stations , by provider in France 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of gas stations in the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
The highest Company Total has 113.0 more Number of gas stations than the lowest Company Dyneff.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is appeared to be the highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of gas stations in the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
The highest Company Total has 113.0 more Number of gas stations than the lowest Company Dyneff.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of gas stations in the y axis.
Company Total has the highest Number of gas stations and Dyneff has the lowest Number of gas stations.
Company Avia has the second highest value for Number of gas stations.
The difference of Number of gas stations between the highest and lowest Company is 113.0.
Number of gas stations at Company Total is 121.0 , second place is Avia at 72.0, and thirdly is Shell at 69.0.
Similar Number of gas stations is found in Company Eni, and Esso.
The Company Total tends to be 2.46 percent higher than average.
